textBeforeTable: Search the PFM: View regulations applicable to projects eligible for Grandfathering or Time Limits provisions of the Stormwater Management Ordinance View Proposed and Recently Adopted PFM and Code Amendments The PFM is available in portable document format (PDF). This manual is no longer available in hard copy format. The PFM is subject to periodic revisions upon action by the Board of Supervisors. The PFM presented here includes all amendments adopted by the Board through June 2, 2015. If you have any questions or comments regarding the PFM, please contact the Site Code Research and Development Branch at 703-324-1780, TTY 711. The Public Facilities Manual (PFM) sets forth the guidelines which govern the design of all public facilities which must be constructed to serve new development. It is intended to serve as a technical manual in the effort to implement the requirements of the Subdivision and Zoning ordinances and other applicable chapters of the Code of the County of Fairfax, Virginia (County Code). Public Facilities Manual
